abstract:
An unlikely alliance between stores and Web sites that prematurely leak copies of discount-filled advertisements indicates how worried retailers are about the holiday shopping season.

But it turns out that a big source of the leaks are the retailers themselves.
snippet:
An unlikely alliance between stores and Web sites that prematurely leak copies of discount-filled advertisements indicates how worried retailers are about the holiday shopping season.

But it turns out that a big source of the leaks are the retail...
lead_paragraph: Every year, retailers denounce the renegade Web sites that prematurely disclose leaked copies of discount-filled advertisements for the day after Thanksgiving.

headline.main: Instead of Fighting Ad Leaks, Some Retailers Embrace Them
headline.print_headline: Instead of Fighting Ad Leaks, Some Retailers Embrace Them
